channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost iOS app
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost iOS app

item.title: CVE-2023-3615|2024-08-02T07:01:57.123Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20ios%20app
item.description: Mattermost iOS app fails to properly validate the server certificate while initializing the TLS connection allowing a network attacker to intercept the WebSockets connection.
